title: Gameplay Dj Sona music not working for team.
body: I was under the impression that from the reveal of Dj Sona, all her team could listen to her music... Is there suppose to be a button somewhere to activate the music? I played on a team that had her and none of us could hear the music except for the person being Dj Sona. Is there a way we can {{summoner:7}} this issue?

replies.body:
Hey mtgbud! 

Your team will need to opt in to the music experience. You can do so by holding tab, and clicking the music note button that is next to Sona's portrait on the far left of the screen. (Not her portrait on the scorecard, but the portrait that has the green circle that tells you when someone's ult is ready.)

Hope this helps! :D
My friend said that no music note showed next to the Sona portrait while opening the scoreboard. Happened both games we played.
Are you looking on the scoreboard, or at the portraits of you and your teammates on the far left? The music note icon is on the far left, and you need to be holding tab.
I can see it, but some people randomly cannot see it apparently.

I'm not sure they're looking in the right spot. It's not actually on the scoreboard. You told tab, and the music note icon is on the very left of the screen - right next to where the portraits are for your team; the ones that have the green bubble to show when someone's ult is ready. 

I've attached a photo of where it is. :] Note, if there's more than one person on a team, the other portraits would be there - this is a custom game.

That is the best clarity pic. Thanks Katey, obviously it's a bit tricky to find it, but I can see why a lot of people including myself are or have had such a hard time finding it. I mean, who looks over there while holding tab? Certainly not {{champion:64}}
I don't think Lee Sin can see much of anything. D:
:O Rito employee makes a mistake?

wow that's a rather unintuitive place to put it.

Thanks for the clarification though

I'll ask my friend to screenshot it if he gets the same bug again.

Also another bug i noticed is that Kinetic's drop is missing. Specifically 1:06 of DJ Sona's Ultimate Concert
www.youtube.com/watch?v=MAiOAert8us

I'm actually having issues hearing her while I am the one playing her. I have everything set to default in case something was muted, but alas, I cannot hear the sweet tunes I payed for :(. Any thoughts on what might be wrong?
The default action for tab is to bring up the scorecard.
^-^ Glad you figured it out!

~~Just played a game with two DJ Sonas (one on each team).  Unless I somehow missed it, even while holding tab, I could not find any music note button to press to turn on Sona's music.  Neither could anyone on my team.  However, I can't guarantee that I looked at the "green circle portrait" while pressing tab.  Will try again.~~ 

~~Either way, it might be~~  **a clarity issue** ~~or a bug!~~

Thanks!

[EDIT]  Yep, I'm an idiot.  You hold tab, but then ignore the tab screen and find the music note next to the character portraits that have the "green ult indicator."  Apologies.
I think the position of the button is throwing some off. When you have another Sona, see if you can locate the music note icon and opt in. If not, please let me know. :]
Thanks.  See the edit above for my admission of idiocy!  It's just a little counter intuitive to bring up the tab score screen and then completely ignore it to find the music note button!
Not your problem at all, it's a bit hard to find if you don't know what you're looking for. :P
Ok Everyone, I found it. You have to hold the tab key and it pops up next to her name to the left of the scorecard. if you let go of the tab key, it disappears also.
Yup, this is correct!
THERE we go, thanks.
Ok thanks. ill give that a try!
You could add an in-game tooltip for people that have never played with a DJ sona on the team before

> [{quoted}](name=Gef21,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=e2UKUuP7,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-25T22:05:39.514+0000)
>
> You could add an in-game tooltip for people that have never played with a DJ sona on the team before

This is a very good suggestion.  You guys have several other hints that pop up on the right for different things... such as the little quests for certain character match ups. (for example, Kha'Zix vs Rengar)
There...is something like this? I've seen it when I had a DJ Sona on my team.

Honestly, if there is, I didn't know about it.  I've only played as the DJ Sona on my team vs bots in a custom game to see how it sounded/looked in-game, I haven't played w/ one on my team to see the tool tip.
I have played with her twice now and bot times I have not heard any music other then her champion nosies. Did I miss something or is there a massive bug with the music?{{champion:37}}
I think it's only for certain people, my friend can hear it, but I can't. so I hope they'll figure out why it's only a select few who can't hear her.

As a Sona player, you will automatically be opted in to the music experiences. Allies will need to opt in by holding tab and clicking the music note next to Sona's portrait, located on the very far left of the screen (not the scorecard).

what I mean is I can't hear her when I am the one playing Sona, I have no doubts that other people have to opt-in, but I'm not getting the music at all AS the sona player and it's making me sad. It's probably something clientside for me, because my friend can hear her when he plays sona, but I have nothing muted, I've triple checked. Sorry for the lack of clarification.

edit update: I just opted in for an ally sona and still cant hear it, so It's definitely client-side

Hmm, that's weird. 

Have you tried resetting your LoL audio settings back to default?
While the music does seem a bit quieter, we can simply change the rest of our audio settings to be lower so that Sona's music can get cranked up.
Yea.. but then I gotta adjust the crap back to their original settings when I'm not grouped with a DJ Sona.  Seems like it would make more sense to just give it a more appropriate default volume.

I'm having the same issue personally.  I had to have in-game music to full settings while turning down the sound fx and stuff to make it so the other sound effects weren't drowning it out... and bc everything was so quiet, I had to turn up my PC's volume.

DJ Sona's music volume is way too low.

> [{quoted}](name=Crunkberri,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=e2UKUuP7,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-25T20:54:21.938+0000)
>
> I'm having the same issue personally.  I had to have in-game music to full settings while turning down the sound fx and stuff to make it so the other sound effects weren't drowning it out... and bc everything was so quiet, I had to turn up my PC's volume.
> 
> DJ Sona's music volume is way too low.

Agreed, would love if the volume on her music was tuned up a bit.
yep, I'm doing a repair now, and if that doesn't fix it, I will probably have to reinstall from scratch to see where this issue lies.
Please feel free to keep me updated. :D
All's well, after repairing it about 3 times unsuccessfully, I have it running and I can hear the sick beats! all it took was a repair, so it must have been a file error on my computer
Phew! Glad to hear it's working now!
I plan to, but my patcher isn't working with me now... error occurs at last 1%
God people here can't read....
guess not. they need to try harder at looking for the music note. hey everyone, just press tab to open up the scorecard a bunch of times and u should see it opening and closing just like the card.
it still isn't working for mwe i checked both places but it isn't shpwing up i check the scoreboard the tab thing and the place where it shows you if their ults are fready what do i do now??
So my friends can't hear the music even after they opt. in. Anyone have a similar problem?
I think the enemy team should be able to listen... Because that... would be awesome...

I have played 2 games with Dj Sona now and I can hear her music and it's awesome!
However in both games my teammates all said that there is not a button for them to turn on the music anywhere.
There is supposed to be a little music note button next to my picture on the game screen for them to toggle the music on and off.
They all said that it was not there.  Anyone else having this issue
guys, to switch form its ctrl+5
